Comment: [What Is a Tariff and Who Pays It? Spoiler Alert: You Will](https://www.usnews.com/news/national-news/articles/what-is-a-tariff-and-who-pays-it-spoiler-alert-you-will)  >**Who Pays a Tariff?**  >The importer who brings the product into the country ‚Äì be it a car or an avocado ‚Äì is responsible for the tariff at the port of entry. Customs officials collect the tax and the money goes to the U.S. Treasury.  >The importer can pass the cost of the tariff along in the form of higher prices to the consumer. Or, in some cases, the manufacturer or importer may choose to absorb some or all of the cost, taking a hit to the bottom line.  >‚ÄúTariff increases are largely paid for by consumers via higher prices, which erodes growth in net income thereby weighing on growth in real consumer spending,‚Äù Wells Fargo economists wrote in a recent report.

Comment: Funny thing is if he did something like 2-5% they MIGHT get some suppliers to adjust prices a bit to help. Hell, China might even subsidise it. It would be a kerfuffle and comes would see price creep, but it would not disrupt trade with China in a major way.   Nobody is going to "eat" 145% and at that point except for a very narrow category of goods, it is effectively an embargo rather than a tariff.   And no matter how many times people who have some basic grasp on world trade and economics try to explain this to people who do not, these dumb motherfuckers are just going to keep drinking the Trump Kool-Aid until the shelves are literally empty.   We tried to tell you guys. I don't know what else we're supposed to do here.

Comment: As a Chinese, I think your president is sick in the head.  Manufacturing typically makes 10-20% profit, and producing a 10 RMB item typically sells for 11 or 12 RMB.  Now you place an order with China, pay the Chinese supplier 12 RMB for an item, and at the same time ask the Chinese supplier to pay your customs 18 RMB in tariffs.  Instead of making a profit, we make a loss of at least 45% on the production of an item.  What business would accept such an order?  Why don't we go home and sleep?Or to manufacture orders from other countries?
